actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide for the distribution of information relating to transportation services for older persons and to require the Federal Council on the Aging to conduct a study of such services.

summary.text: Older Americans Act Transportation Amendments - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965: (1) to require the National Information and Resource Clearing House for the Aging to prepare and disseminate information related to transportation services for older persons; and (2) to require the Council on Aging to undertake a study of transportation programs for older persons offered by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide for the distribution of information relating to transportation services for older persons and to require the Federal Council on the Aging to conduct a study of such services.
